segmentosSRT.text: Our family's turn to donate iron.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
If you take all our pots away,
how will we cook?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Give it to us if you can't finish.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: What the hell are you doing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, daddy wants you to see the show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Your boy's on his way with a bowl of tea.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: All right. You go on ahead.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Tell him to leave. He killed my son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- He's already here.
- Tell him to go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: I'll get some water so you can wash up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia, you're going to be a mother.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia, after the child is born...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: have a photo taken every year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: you still owe us a life!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu, is your wife at home?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
We'll visit you after
she's out of the hospital.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: When you're pushing, bite on a towel.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Here, bite on this. It'll save your teeth.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Do whatever the doctor tells you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: It'll be quick if you push.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04
